extendedInfo.description: This app is for use by Hard Rock Global Conference attendees only. "All Is One!" Hard Rock's 2013 Global Conference will not only highlight the world in which we live and do business, but the continuing strength of Hard Rock and its worldwide partnerships. This app will help you plan your conference by accessing the schedule, get push notifications for up-to-the-minute details and information, learn about the conference speakers, and much more. The Hard Rock Global Conference 2013 app includes: -Detailed Agenda information -Speaker information -Rate sessions and speakers -After session surveys -Maps of the venue, meeting spaces and local areas of interest. -Receive push notifications to keep you updated on conference details and information -Take notes within the app -Twitter feed for the conference hashtag -Add your contact info to share with other attendees -Participate in the photo scavenger hunt for prizesKeywords: Hard Rock,All Is One,Hard Rock App,Hard Rock Hotel,Global Conference App
